TRAX ATB Data Interface option

Adds APB control and ATB data interfaces to the TRAX module

TRAX ATB Data Interface option
Selected

Implements AMBA Trace Bus interface so that compressed trace data may be output to an ARM CoreSight system. This requires that APB Debug Access is enabled.

Parent topic: Trace option
Previous topic: TRAX Memory Size
Next topic: TRAX Memory Sharing option
Related information
APB Debug Access option
